channel.title: linux on blog.solmazfs
channel.description: Recent content in linux on blog.solmazfs

item.title: Command Line General (Linux)
item.description: imagemagick didder ffmpeg imagemagick Resize image. 1 convert -resize 50% input.png output.png Add border to an image. 1 convert -bordercolor white -border 3 -bordercolor black -border 86 input.png output.png didder Image dithering. 1 didder --palette 'black white' -i input.png -o output.png bayer 16x16 ffmpeg Cut specific timeline from video. 1 2 3 ffmpeg -ss < starting point > -i < input > -t < how long > -vcodec copy -acodec copy < output > #e.
